name: Breach of condition; penalty
text: Every licensed pawnbroker who fails to comply with any of the provisions of this part shall be fined not more than $2,500 for each violation and shall forfeit the pawnbroker's license. [L 1886, c 28, §5; am L 1903, c 8, §2; RL 1925, §2076; RL 1935, §2497; RL 1945, §7101; RL 1955, §155-81; HRS ; gen ch 1985; am L 1992, c 192, §5]
